Even though it\' very simple, it marks the first computer games I create ever',id:3,state:'after-active'}];var refCollection={'home':homeRef,'about':aboutRef,'projects':projectsRef,'contact':contactRef};var handleClickScroll=function handleClickScroll(name){refCollection[name].current.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth',block:"start",inline:"nearest"});};var handleReveal=function handleReveal(e){for(var i in collection){var windowHeight=window.innerHeight;var elementTop=collection[i].current.getBoundingClientRect().top;var elementVisible=150;if(elementTop<windowHeight-elementVisible){collection[i].current.classList.add("active");}else{collection[i].current.classList.remove("active");}}};useEffect(function(){window.addEventListener('scroll',handleReveal);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{clickFunction:handleClickScroll}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{clickFunction:handleClickScroll,ref:homeRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{ref:aboutRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{projectsList:projectsList,ref:projectsRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{ref:contactRef})]});}export default App;
